TEST=$(echo 345) # comment
TEST2=123
# comment won't get run
echo test
---

a [presentation](http://google.com)

$ echo aaa && sleep 2 && echo bbb

$ echo $TEST

def main():
    print("hello world")

$ watch -n 1 date
